website_summaries.verdict: Specifically designed to track sports ball or puck speed.
pros: Designed to make continuous measurements to capture the fastest speed of the ball or puck
Users love the built-in memory that holds the previous 25 speeds for review
Personal Training Mode allows you to operate it hands-free, so you can practice by yourself
cons: Some users tell us they have to be closer than the recommended 120 feet for it to work accurately

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have bought the entire package with battery charger and tru-pod for the same price. It’s a bummer. We used this next to a Striker gun to compare and it was right on. We have done it multiple times and the only difference is this tended to round down. For example if the Striker clocked 76.7 the pocket radar registered 76. We have enjoyed this very much, use it all the time to compare speeds. We bought this several months ago and are still on the original set of batteries. We do not usually use the continuous feature on a regular basis. Great tool.

customer_reviews.title: Not Accurate

I was positioned directly behind the catcher, as instructed by the user manual. I am going to attempt to exchange the unit, which I have to do directly through pocketradar.com. customer_reviews.title: very accurate

Ball coach has good range, easy to use, and accurate. Wish I'd bought it sooner. It's expensive, but personally, an inaccurate gun is useless. What's the point in measuring ball speed, using something that doesn't work (Bushnell). Would definitely recommend the upgrade.

product_meta.title: Pocket Radar Ball Coach / Pro-Level Speed Training Tool and Radar Gun
feature_bullets: Automatically finds the fastest speed of a ball or puck for baseball, softball, tennis, volleyball, lacrosse, hockey and cricket

Powerful features include automatic hands-free Constant-On Mode, easy automatic triggering (simply hold button down and release) and built-in memory with the previous 25 speeds (keep track and review)
Increase hitting power to turn singles into extra-base hits and dial-in pitch speeds to disrupt timing and keep hitters off balance
Visible progress builds trust and confidence in training programs, which leads to higher motivation
Specifically designed to measure the fastest speed of a ball in flight
Not Compatible with the Pocket Radar App
